user.title: YouTube Music URL Player
user.description:
Paste a YouTube Music/YouTube URL to automatically play on selected media_player(s).

Playback method is automatically selected based on device:
• Cast devices: Play via YouTube app
• Other devices: Direct stream URL → Proxy (fallback)

[Auth (optional, for private playlists)]
Copy Request Headers from Chrome DevTools and paste
Leave empty for public content only

[po_token (optional, for bot detection bypass)]
See: https://pytubefix.readthedocs.io/en/latest/user/po_token.html

play_url.name: Play URL
play_url.description: Parse and play a YouTube Music/YouTube URL on the media_player. Playback method is automatically selected.

media_player.name: Target
media_player.description: Leave empty to use default target(s) from config
